  • Cold Case Act Students join Sen. Doug Jones (D-Al.) to Urge President Trump to Appoint Board Members

    The Cold Case Act review board is currently being stalled by the President's failure to appoint members by the deadline in the bill.

  • Cold Case Act Signed Into Law

    The Cold Case Act has been signed into law, completing a three-year journey that began in a high school classroom and ended in the Oval Office.

    Press Release

  • Cold Case Act Awaits Presidential Signature to Become Law

    The Cold Case Act, which passed Congress in December 2018, has under a day to be signed before it expires.

    Press Release

    Background information for the Civil Rights Cold Case Records Collection Act.

  • Cold Case Act Passes House, Awaits Signature to Become Law

    On Friday, Dec. 21, the Civil Rights Cold Case Records Collection Act was voted through the House of Representatives, now clearing both chambers of Congress.

    Press Release

  • Cold Case Act Passes US Senate

    On Monday, Dec. 17, the Civil Rights Cold Case Records Collection Act was voted through the United States Senate.

    Press Release

  • Congressional Budget Office Scores Cold Case Act

    In the report, the CBO finds that the Cold Case Act "would not significantly increase net direct spending or on-budget deficits"

    Press Release

  • Doug Jones Introduces Cold Case Act to the U.S. Senate

    On July 10, 2018, Sen. Doug Jones (D-AL) Introduced the CCA to the U.S. Senate.

Contact Information

We can be reached by email at press@coldcaseact.com.

For urgent press matters, Josh Fayer can serve as a point of contact. He can be reached at jafayer@syr.edu, or by phone number at (609)619-1323.
